summary: Frontend testing completed for Prima Nota simplification and AssoInvoice view uniformity. All features working correctly: Prima Nota Cassa/Banca tabs display without popups, 'Vedi' buttons open AssoInvoice view in new tab, rows are not clickable.
seed_data_creation: None - used existing data with year 2025
context_for_next_testing_agent: Prima Nota simplification is complete. TransactionDetailModal removed, rows not clickable, 'Vedi' buttons open AssoInvoice view in new tab. Use year 2025 to see movements with fattura_id.

prima_nota_cassa_tab.details: Tab displays correctly with 1408 movements (year 2025), 23 'Vedi' buttons visible, no popup on row click

prima_nota_banca_tab.details: Tab displays correctly with 2000 movements (year 2025), 9 'Vedi' buttons visible on first page, no popup on row click

prima_nota_banca_standalone.details: Page /prima-nota-banca loads correctly with 2902 movements, 313 'Vedi' buttons, stats cards working

vedi_button_functionality.details: Vedi button calls window.open() with correct URL: /api/fatture-ricevute/fattura/{id}/view-assoinvoice

fatture_page_pdf_button.details: Page /fatture shows 1432 invoices with PDF buttons that open AssoInvoice view

archivio_fatture_ricevute.details: Page /fatture-ricevute shows 100 invoices with 'Vedi PDF' buttons that open AssoInvoice view

assoinvoice_endpoint.details: Endpoint /api/fatture-ricevute/fattura/{id}/view-assoinvoice returns HTML with invoice data and line items

no_popup_on_row_click.details: Clicking on table rows does NOT open any popup/modal (TransactionDetailModal removed)

features_verified: Prima Nota Cassa (/prima-nota): Tab Cassa displays correctly without popup
Prima Nota Banca (/prima-nota): Tab Banca displays correctly without popup
Vedi button in FATTURA column opens invoice in AssoInvoice format in new tab
Prima Nota Banca standalone (/prima-nota-banca): Works correctly
AssoInvoice view (/api/fatture-ricevute/fattura/{id}/view-assoinvoice): Shows invoice with line items
Fatture page (/fatture): PDF button opens AssoInvoice view
Archivio Fatture Ricevute (/fatture-ricevute): Vedi PDF button works
